mapper.select: select project_no, project_thumbnail, project_title, project_category, project_end_date, project_goal_amount, now_amount, project_viewcnt, supporting_count from dream_project where member_no = #{member_no}

select project_no, project_thumbnail, project_title, project_category, project_end_date, project_goal_amount, now_amount, project_viewcnt, supporting_count from dream_project where member_no = #{member_no} and (project_end_date - project_start_date) = 0
